title: Main Menu/Login screens

properties.name: description
properties.value: The appearance of the main menu, for the most part, remains the same throughout the year. However, they are usually changed to commemorate major content releases, as well as during Halloween and Christmas events.

content:
The appearance of the main menu, for the most part, remains the same throughout the year. However, they are usually changed to commemorate major content releases, as well as during Halloween and Christmas events.

This page serves as a gallery to display past appearances of the main menu.

Contents

  • 1 Login screens
  • 2 Login backgrounds
    • 2.1 Mobile
  • 3 Login torch flames

  • The login screen during the 2018 Birthday event

  • The login screen when the Theatre of Blood was released

  • The login screen when the Kebos Lowlands was released

  • The login screen when Song of the Elves was released

  • The login screen when Sins of the Father was released

  • The login screen when A Kingdom Divided was released

  • The login screen when Nex was released

  • The login screen when Shattered Relics League was released

  • The original default set, prior to the release of Dragon Slayer II

  • The new default set, with the wrath rune symbol replacing the body rune

rawContent:
The appearance of the main menu, for the most part, remains the same throughout the year. However, they are usually changed to commemorate major content releases, as well as during Halloween and Christmas events.

This page serves as a gallery to display past appearances of the main menu.

==Login screens==
<gallery mode="packed" heights="150" style="text-align:center">
Default login screen.png|The default login screen
Old School RuneScape Mobile - Login screen.png|The default mobile client login screen.
Farming login screen.png|The login screen when [[Farming]] was released
Construction login screen.png|The login screen when [[Construction]] was released
Hunter login screen.png|The login screen when [[Hunter]] was released
Halloween login screen.png|The login screen during [[Halloween event]]s
Halloween login screen (2019).png|The login screen during the [[2019 Halloween event]]
Christmas login screen.png|The login screen during [[Christmas event]]s
Monkey Madness II login screen.png|The login screen when [[Monkey Madness II]] was released
Chambers of Xeric login screen.png|The login screen when the [[Chambers of Xeric]] was released
Inferno login screen.png|The login screen when the [[Inferno]] was released
Fossil Island login screen.png|The login screen when [[Fossil Island]] was released
Dragon Slayer II login screen.png|The login screen when [[Dragon Slayer II]] was released
OSRS 5th birthday login screen.png|The login screen during the [[2018 Birthday event]]
Theatre of Blood login screen.png|The login screen when the [[Theatre of Blood]] was released
Kebos Lowlands login screen.png|The login screen when the [[Kebos Lowlands]] was released
Song of the Elves login screen.png|The login screen when [[Song of the Elves]] was released
Sins of the Father login screen.png|The login screen when [[Sins of the Father]] was released
A Kingdom Divided login screen.png|The login screen when [[A Kingdom Divided]] was released
Nex login screen.png|The login screen when [[Nex]] was released
Shattered Relics League login screen.png|The login screen when [[Shattered Relics League]] was released
</gallery>
